resources.string:
This application displays a floating overlay with controls that allow changing the system volume. The application uses a foreground task to show the overlay. The floating overlay and service can be closed by pressing the exit button on the overlay itself (expanded view) or by pressing the close button displayed on the persistent foreground service notification. 

 The overlay can be expanded by long pressing on the gesture icon. A single press on the gesture icon will increase the volume, while a double press will decrease it. The overlay can be flicked over to a side of the screen by preforming a horizontal flick gesture on the drag icon. 

 The overlay may also be manually moved on screen via the drag icon (expanded view). 

 To show the overlay, press the show overlay button.
This app requires extra permissions to be able to run. If the permissions are not granted the application will not work on your device.
The application shows a persistent notification while the overlay is visible.
You have granted the notification permission! The application will use this permission to shows a persistent notification while the overlay is visible.
The application uses a foreground service to display a floating overlay with controls.
You have granted the foreground service permission! The application uses a foreground service to display a floating overlay with controls.
The application will draw an overlay with controls over other applications.
You have granted the draw over other apps permission! The application will draw an overlay with controls over other applications.
If you wish to close the application please press the back button.
